DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether select complementary approach temporomandibular joint ( TMJ ) pain management-acupuncture effective usual care .
DOC.brief_title: Complementary Medicine Approaches TMD Pain Management
DOC.detailed_description: Temporomandibular disorder characterize pain tenderness muscle mastication and/or ( TMJ ) , limitation jaw open often accompany deviation mandibular path , click , pop grate TMJ sound . This study compare effectiveness complementary therapy chiropractic therapy bodywork therapy standard care TMJ pain . If complementary intervention show effective , goal design implement Phase III clinical trial evaluate health consequence cost therapy . Participants evaluate baseline , 6 12 month post-intervention . Clinical examination , saliva sample assess salivary cortisol level , series questionnaire assess pain grade dysfunctional pain , psychological functioning , physical symptom use assess outcome . The investigator passively monitor health care utilization within KPNW use clinical , research , administrative database .
